content:
Exercise 8.3 $1$
Exercise 8.4 $$
\begin{aligned} \dfrac{\partial E_{n}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}{k=1}\dfrac{\partial E{n}}{\partial y_{k}}\dfrac{\partial y_{k}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}_{k=1} (y_k - t_k) x_d \end{aligned} $$
summary: Exercise 8.3 $1$ Exercise 8.4 $$ \begin{aligned} \dfrac{\partial E_{n}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}{k=1}\dfrac{\partial E{n}}{\partial y_{k}}\dfrac{\partial y_{k}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}_{k=1} (y_k - t_k) x_d \end{aligned} $$

content:
About Me Hi! I am Zong-Wei, currently an AI algorithm developer at JIVOO, where we provide solutions for fingerprint recognition. In addition to fingerprint recognition, my research areas include:
Object pose estimation Face anti-spoofing I look forward to sharing some paper readings and insights here!
Publications Published Papers RDPN6D: Residual-based Dense Point-wise Network for 6Dof Object Pose Estimation Based on RGB-D Images
IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) Workshops DLGC, 2024 ğŸ† BEST PAPER in DLGC Authors: Zong-Wei Hong, Yen-Yang Hung, Chu-Song Chen Domain-Generalized Face Anti-Spoofing with Unknown Attacks
IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP), 2023 Authors: Zong-Wei Hong, Yu-Chen Lin, Hsuan-Tung Liu, Yi-Ren Yeh, Chu-Song Chen Preprints Improving Facial Landmark Detection Accuracy and Efficiency with Knowledge Distillation Arxiv Authors: Zong-Wei Hong, Yu-Chen Lin
